CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 11, 1955, pg. 7 reads:"Graduates From Mellon Junior High - Ella Wilson graduated from the Mellon Junior High School in Mount Lebanon last week as the only Negro member of her class. School authorities gave her permission to invite three guests from other schools for the graduation prom.  Left to right are Ann Furlong, Rick Warnky, Matty Mulliken, Pat Champion, Dennis Kraber, Ernest Lee of Schenley High School, Ella Wilson of Mellon Junior High, June Gibson of Baxter Junior High School, Rick Marshall, Bill Gamble of Oliver High School, Alice Myers, Wesley Schroeder and Bob Sullivan. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mellon Junior High School graduates, from left:Ann Furlong, Rick Warnky, Matty Mulliken, Pat Champion, Dennis Kraber, Ernest Lee, Schenley High School; Ella Wilson, June Gibson, Baxter Junior High School; Rick Marshall, Bill Gamble, Oliver High School; Alice Myers, Wesley Schroeder, and Bob Sullivan, posed outside of school, Mt. Lebanon
